questions.question: You are allowed to bring food to class...

choices.answer: for parties and with permission.
whenever you want! Who's hungry?
the third Monday of every month.
and sneakily eat it when Mademoiselle isn't looking.

questions.question: If you bring your phone to class, you should...

choices.answer: keep it upside down on your desk when not in use
keep it in your lap and sneak peeks every 2 minutes
keep it on silent, not vibrate
keep it on max volume with an annoying ring tone.

questions.question: You are allowed ... excused tardy/tardies per trimester.

choices.answer: unlimited

questions.question: Your 8 minutes of passing time should be used to...

choices.answer: go to the bathroom, get a drink, and stop at your locker.
sleep.
frantically finish the homework you forgot to do.
talk with friends until the bell rings, then ask to leave
as much as possible.
as little as possible.
only when it's really necessary.
only when talking to Mademoiselle.

questions.question: You should use French in class...

choices.answer: when or before the 1-minute warning bell rings.
when and if you feel like it.
when Mademoiselle starts yelling at you.
when you finish telling your friend a 20-minute story.

questions.question: You should start the warm-up activity...
In partner and group activities, you should...

choices.answer: stay on task and participate in discussions & activities.
sleep.
daydream.
check your Instagram feed.

questions.question: At the end of class, you should...

choices.answer: continue working until Mademoiselle dismisses you.
stop working 5 minutes before the bell rings.
pack up your supplies 5 minutes before the bell rings.
wait by the door.

questions.question: Every day, you should bring ... to class.

choices.answer: your textbook, workbook, binder, notebook, pen, and pencil
nothing
half a pencil and your breakfast
your planner
check with a trusted classmate for any notes or work.
check the absent bucket for the day(s) you missed.
check Google Classroom for any assignments.
assume that the rest of us were mourning your absence.

questions.question: If you miss class, you should...
You can get extra credit by bringing ... to class. (limit 5, 1 point per item)

choices.answer: kleenex
Clorox wipes
cookies
French puns

questions.question: If you do poorly on a quiz, you...

choices.answer: can retake it one time after completing the paperwork.
are stuck with that grade forever.
can retake it as many times as you want.
can retake it but only for half credit.

questions.question: Homework and classwork are worth ... % of your grade.
Quizzes, tests, and projects are worth ... % of your grade.
Participation is worth ... % of your grade.
In order to get your daily participation point, you must...

choices.answer: repeat vocabulary terms.
complete your work on time.
answer every question Mademoiselle asks.
be respectful, responsible, and productive.

questions.question: Collectively, you and your classmates can earn daily stars by...

choices.answer: positive participation and environment and a tidy room
being the loudest classroom in the school.
making the most puns in French.
bringing cookies.
using translators for large chunks of text.
copying another person's work.
using unapproved notes.
using signs and posters around the room for help.

questions.question: Cheating includes...
For your warm-up activity every Tuesday and Thursday,  you will...

choices.answer: silently read a French book, comic, or magazine.
practice vocabulary and grammar from the current lesson.
analyze song lyrics and watch French music videos.
practice French vocabulary and grammar using Duolingo.
walk around the back of the room.
not disrupt class.
quickly get on task.
do your best Ricky Ricardo impression as you enter.

questions.question: If you arrive late to class, you should...

choices.answer: walk around the back of the room.
not disrupt class.
wait until downtime (if possible).
parkour around the room to get to your destination.

questions.question: If you need to sharpen your pencil, get a kleenex, etc., you should...

choices.answer: have your planner filled out and ready to be signed.
ask to leave in French using expressions around the room.
sign out when you leave and in when you return.
shut the door so that it locks behind you.

questions.question: If you absolutely must leave class, you should...

choices.answer: choose a book, comic, or magazine inside the border.
mark your place in the library with your bookmark.
fill out your reading log at the end.
play French vocab games on your phone.

choices.answer: the color coded trays on the file cabinets.
the color coded buckets on the back counter.
the recycling bin.
anywhere on Mademoiselle's desk.

choices.answer: the color coded trays on the file cabinets.

choices.answer: make sure it's on silent.

do nothing for the entire class period.
complete the NHS tutoring form and get a free tutor.

whine about it until Mademoiselle comes to your aid.
ask for help from a trusted classmate.

choices.answer: stay with the class and exit out the back door of school.

wander around the school sniffing for smoke.

go outside to check the weather.
take the elevator downstairs because it's faster.
